name: Dungeon Island
description:
• Play the incredible storyline of Dungeon Island​ as a brave adventurer
  • Fight monsters to free Dungeon Island from evil forces
  • Explore an infinite open world
  • Venture into dark caves full of treasures and threats​​
  • Craft and build using the resources you collect

Lore:

Dungeon Island is an infinite mysterious archipelago. For many years has been the home of countless adventurers who enjoy exploring.
Each adventurer lived a daydream by discovering new treasures and uknown islands every day.
But one day one of them while adventuring in a cave discovered something that changed everything.
That something triggered evil forces.
Evil monsters began to emerge from caves.
Dungeon Island became soon a nightmare for adventurers and only the bravest remained to try to discover the origin of monsters and return Dungeon Island to its former glory.
